Description.Name: Herakles
Description.Details: In what world you might ask would a Clanner be willing to part ways with the Khans to travel amongst mercs such as yourselves. Evidently the world you found him on. It doesn't take much prodding for his explanation either. He is all too eager to explain that he is the reincarnation of Hercules and that fighting amongst the dreggs of the inner sphere and beyond as a Lancer-for-hire is one of his many 'Labours'. You assume, like many others would, that he's crazy. Seeing him pilot his 'mech however would quickly dissuade you from passing up on hiring him. COMMUNITY CONTENT
